text: appudu allah oka kakini pampadu; adi nelanu travvi atani sodaruni savanni ela dacalo cupincindi. Atadu (khabil): "Ayyo, na paduganu! Nenu i kaki pati vanni kuda kaleka poyanu! Na sodaruni savanni dace (upayam) vetaka leka poyanu kada!" Ani vapoyadu. Appudatadu pascattapa pade varilo ceri poyadu
